{{cpp/locale/locale/title|1=operator==, operator!=}}
{{cpp/locale/locale/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|1=
bool operator==( const locale&amp; other ) const;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|until=c++20|1=
bool operator!=( const locale&amp; other ) const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Tests two locales for equality. Named locales are considered equal if their names are equal. Unnamed locales are considered equal if they are copies of each other. 

{{rrev|since=c++20|
{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|a {{lc|std::locale}} object to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|true}} if {{c|other}} is a copy of {{c|*this}} or has an identical name, {{c|false}} otherwise.

@2@ {{c|false}} if {{c|other}} is a copy of {{c|*this}} or has an identical name, {{c|true}} otherwise.
